ArraySettingsSchema.description: Schema describing NumPy array generation settings.

dtypes.description: Allowed NumPy dtypes (strings accepted by numpy.dtype).
dtypes.title: Dtypes

max_elements.description: Maximum total element count for generated arrays.
max_elements.title: Max Elements

max_ndim.description: Maximum number of dimensions for generated arrays.
max_ndim.title: Max Ndim

max_side.description: Maximum size per dimension for generated arrays.
max_side.title: Max Side

ArraySettingsSchema.title: ArraySettingsSchema

pytest.description: Configuration for the built-in pytest fixture emitter.

FieldPolicyOptionsSchema.description: Schema describing supported field policy overrides.

enum_policy.description: Enum selection policy for matching fields.
enum_policy.title: Enum Policy

p_none.description: Probability override for returning None on optional fields.
p_none.title: P None

union_policy.description: Union selection policy for matching fields.
union_policy.title: Union Policy

FieldPolicyOptionsSchema.title: FieldPolicyOptionsSchema

secret_bytes_length.description: Default length for generated SecretBytes values.
secret_bytes_length.title: Secret Bytes Length

secret_str_length.description: Default length for generated SecretStr values.
secret_str_length.title: Secret Str Length

url_include_path.description: Include a path component when generating URLs.
url_include_path.title: Url Include Path

url_schemes.description: Allowed URL schemes used when generating URLs.
url_schemes.title: Url Schemes

indent.description: Indentation level for JSON output (0 for compact).
indent.title: Indent

orjson.description: Use orjson for serialization when available.
orjson.title: Orjson

style.description: How emitted pytest fixtures are structured.
style.title: Style

arrays.description: Configuration for NumPy array generation: max_ndim, max_side, max_elements, dtypes.

exclude.description: Glob patterns of fully-qualified model names to exclude by default.
exclude.title: Exclude

field_policies.description: Field policy definitions keyed by glob or regex patterns that may target model names or dotted field paths.
field_policies.title: Field Policies

identifiers.description: Configuration for identifier providers (secret lengths, URL schemes, UUID version).

include.description: Glob patterns of fully-qualified model names to include by default.
include.title: Include

locale.description: Default Faker locale used when generating data.
locale.title: Locale

locales.description: Mapping of glob or regex patterns (models or fields) to Faker locale identifiers.
locales.title: Locales

overrides.description: Per-model overrides keyed by fully-qualified model name.
overrides.title: Overrides

p_none.description: Probability of sampling `None` for optional fields when unspecified.
p_none.title: P None

preset.description: Curated preset name applied before other configuration (e.g., 'boundary').
preset.title: Preset

seed.description: Global seed controlling deterministic generation. Accepts int or string.
seed.title: Seed
